thread.title: Watch highlights of Derby 4 Wolves 2

title: Watch highlights of Derby 4 Wolves 2
text:
Tweet 
Chris Martin scored twice, opening the scoring in the third minute as Wolves made a sluggish start. 
He also saw a penalty saved by goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez as Derby threatened to run riot. Some shoddy defending from Wolves contributed heavily to the defeat. 
Martinez, himself, was at fault for Martin's second when he failed to claim a Bradley Johnson cross. Johnson then scored Derby's third with Wolves unable to clear a corner. 
The score-line was made respectable by Adam Le Fondre's second half goal to bring it back to 4-2, after Johnny Russell had increased Derby's lead after the break. More on this story:
